roles.description: Realtime FX prices for the ribbon (major currency pairs).
roles.notes: Primary FX ribbon role for homepage and dashboard.

roles.description: Realtime FX prices for the mini widget (batch of pairs).
roles.notes: FX mini-widget role (batch quotes for multiple pairs).

roles.description: Master list of FX currency pairs available in the app.
roles.notes: Used to populate FX pair selectors and validate inputs.

roles.description: End-of-day FX price series for charts and sparkline displays.
roles.notes: Used for FX historical charts (updated daily after market close).

roles.description: Detailed FX quote for a selected currency pair (full data).
roles.notes: Used on FX detail pages or pop-ups (queried when needed).

roles.description: Realtime commodity prices for the ribbon (metals, energy, etc).
roles.notes: Primary commodities ribbon role (e.g. Gold, Oil prices).

roles.description: Realtime commodity prices for the mini widget (batch of key commodities).
roles.notes: Mini-widget for commodities (batch updates for selected commodities).

roles.description: Master list of commodities available in the app (metals, energy, etc).
roles.notes: Used for commodity selectors and validations.

roles.description: End-of-day commodity price series for historical charts.
roles.notes: Used for commodity sparkline and detail charts (daily updates).

roles.description: Detailed commodity quote for a selected commodity (full data).
roles.notes: Used on commodity detail pages (queried on selection, e.g. for metals/agri).

roles.description: Detailed data for energy commodities (oil, gas, etc).
roles.notes: User-facing role for energy commodity detail views (enriched by OilPriceAPI data).

roles.description: Detailed data for metal commodities (gold, silver, etc).
roles.notes: User-facing role for metals commodity detail (provided via FMP).

roles.description: Detailed data for agricultural commodities (wheat, corn, etc).
roles.notes: User-facing role for agricultural commodity detail (provided via FMP).

roles.description: Realtime cryptocurrency prices for the ribbon (major crypto pairs).
roles.notes: Primary crypto ribbon role (e.g. BTC, ETH rates on homepage).

roles.description: Realtime crypto prices for the mini widget (batch of crypto pairs).
roles.notes: Crypto mini-widget role (batch updates for selected cryptocurrencies).

roles.description: Master list of cryptocurrencies/tokens available in the app.
roles.notes: Used for crypto symbol selectors and validation.

roles.description: End-of-day cryptocurrency price series for charts.
roles.notes: Used for crypto historical charts (daily cadence).

roles.description: Detailed crypto quote for a selected cryptocurrency (full data).
roles.notes: Used on crypto detail pages (queried on demand).

roles.description: Snapshot of all exchanges with their current open/closed status.
roles.notes: Provides global exchange market open/closed indicators for UI.

roles.description: Upcoming holidays for a selected exchange (calendar view).
roles.notes: Provides exchange-specific holiday data for market schedule displays.

roles.description: Technical role for single exchange market hours (open/close times).
roles.notes: Technical role supporting exchange-specific status (used internally for gating updates).

roles.description: Master list of exchanges (with locale info) supported by the app.
roles.notes: Used for populating exchange dropdowns and linking exchange data.

roles.description: Technical role for retrieving trading hours of a single exchange.
roles.notes: Used internally to check open hours of a specific exchange (supporting market-state roles).

roles.description: Technical role for retrieving holiday dates for a single exchange.
roles.notes: Used internally to fetch holiday data for one exchange (supporting market-state roles).

roles.description: Technical role for intraday FX quotes (single pair, short quote).
roles.notes: Backs the fx-ribbon-realtime role on the worker (handles one-pair quotes).

roles.description: Technical role for intraday batch FX quotes (for mini-widget).
roles.notes: Backs the fx-mini-widget role on the worker (handles batch FX quotes).

roles.description: Technical role for intraday commodity quote (single symbol).
roles.notes: Backs the commodities ribbon role (single commodity quote updates).

roles.description: Technical role for intraday batch commodity quotes (mini-widget).
roles.notes: Backs the commodities mini-widget role (batch commodity quotes).

roles.description: Technical role for latest oil/energy prices via OilPriceAPI.
roles.notes: Fetches latest oil and energy commodity prices to enrich the commodities ribbon.

roles.description: Technical role for hourly price series of commodities via OilPriceAPI.
roles.notes: Supports integration of oil hourly price data (used in detail charts).

roles.description: Technical role for daily price series of commodities via OilPriceAPI.
roles.notes: Supports integration of oil daily price data (used in detail charts).

roles.description: Technical role for weekly price series of commodities via OilPriceAPI.
roles.notes: Supports integration of oil weekly price data (used in detail charts).

roles.description: Technical role for catalogue of marine fuel ports via OilPriceAPI.
roles.notes: Backs the internal marine fuel port list (used for marine fuel data features).

roles.description: Technical role for detailed data on a specific marine fuel port.
roles.notes: Backs detailed marine fuel port views (queried on demand).

roles.description: Technical role for historical marine fuel price series at ports.
roles.notes: Supports marine fuel price charts (updated weekly via OilPriceAPI).

roles.description: Technical role for FX exchange rate via Twelve Data (backup).
roles.notes: Backup FX quote role used when FMP data is unavailable.

roles.description: Technical role for FX pairs list via Twelve Data (backup).
roles.notes: Backup FX catalogue role used if FMP FX list fails.

roles.description: Technical role for crypto assets list via Twelve Data (backup).
roles.notes: Backup crypto catalogue role used if FMP crypto list fails.

roles.description: Technical role for crypto conversion via Twelve Data (backup FX-like for crypto).
roles.notes: Backup crypto price role (used if FMP crypto quote fails).

roles.description: Technical role for daily crypto price series via Twelve Data (backup).
roles.notes: Backup crypto daily series role (used if FMP crypto chart fails).

roles.description: Technical role for intraday crypto series via Twelve Data.
roles.notes: Potential backup for intraday crypto data (not user-facing yet).

roles.description: Technical role for intraday batch commodity quotes (shared by FMP and backups).
roles.notes: This role is used by both primary (FMP) and backup (Twelve Data) endpoints for commodity mini-widget quotes.

roles.description: Technical role for OilPriceAPI's commodity list (energy).
roles.notes: Supports the internal commodities catalogue for energy-specific entries.

roles.description: Technical role for OilPriceAPI's commodity detail (energy).
roles.notes: Backs the energy commodity detail role with OilPriceAPI data.

roles.description: Technical role for stock symbols list via Twelve Data.
roles.notes: Backup stock catalogue role (for potential future equities features).

roles.description: Technical role for stock exchanges list via Twelve Data.
roles.notes: Backup exchanges list role (for potential equities features).

roles.description: Technical role for daily stock price series via Twelve Data.
roles.notes: Backup daily stock chart role (for potential equities charts).

roles.description: Technical role for intraday stock price series via Twelve Data.
roles.notes: Backup intraday stock chart role (for potential equities charts).

roles.description: Technical role for MACD indicator via Twelve Data.
roles.notes: Provides MACD technical indicator (queried on demand in detail views).

roles.description: Technical role for RSI indicator via Twelve Data.
roles.notes: Provides RSI technical indicator (queried on demand in detail views).
